quotes.quote: Men seldom make passes at girls who wear glasses.
Jump, and you will find out how to unfold your wings as you fall.
To succeed, jump as quickly at opportunities as you do at conclusions.
Don't be a fish; be a frog. Swim in the water and jump when you hit ground.
Have a dream, chase it down, jump over every single hurdle, and run through fire and ice to get there.
Challenge yourself, jump off the deep end and learn to swim.
The greatest risk is really to take no risk at all. You've got to go out there, jump off the cliff, and take chances.
Jump into the middle of things, get your hands dirty, fall flat on your face, and then reach for the stars.
When you jump for joy, beware that no one moves the ground from beneath your feet.
Sometimes, if you aren't sure about something, you just have to jump off the bridge and grow your wings on the way down.
When people jump on your mistakes, don't hide from them; let people know that you're human, too.
To choose love and jump in not knowing, with a lot of unknowns, is a brave act.
If you want to be a different fish, jump out of school.
It's tough to run fast and jump off roofs when your feet are freezing off!
Something comes along and you have to jump on and do it. You can't stop until it's done.
If you don't jump on the new, you don't survive.
Sometimes if you jump into something too quickly, you can screw up something that might have been good two years down the road.
Successful people jump at opportunity and take advantage of it.
You can only jump so far until you break your leg. You can only land so hard until something explodes.
Narcissism and self-deception are survival mechanisms without which many of us might just jump off a bridge.
The better a work is, the more it attracts criticism; it is like the fleas who rush to jump on white linens.
The trouble is that people are all too ready to jump to conclusions about anybody who they think looks a bit strange.  They think you  must be mentally subnormal.
It's not about how high you jump. It's about how high everyone else jumps.
